New Records: Virat Kohli equals Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds!
Ravindra Jadeja equals Sachin Tendulkar's tally of ODI five-fors
Key Match Events: India beat South Africa by 243 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his gratitude to God for equaling Sachin Tendulkar's record on his birthday
Virat Kohli said that he will continue to try to help the team in any way possible
Miscellaneous Highlights: The wicket was a bit tricky to bat on
India's total was well above par
The wicket will get slower and slower
